channel.title: Movie Trailers RSS Feed
channel.description: Movie trailers rss feed by Moviefone.

item.title: 'IF' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: A young girl discovers an ability to see people's imaginary friends who have been abandoned by the kids they helped.

item.title: 'Miller's Girl' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: A talented young writer (Jenna Ortega) embarks on a creative odyssey when her teacher (Martin Freeman) assigns a project that entangles them both in an increasingly complex web.

item.title: 'Civil War' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: From writer/director Alex Garland and starring Kirsten Dunst, Wagner Moura, Stephen McKinley Henderson, and Cailee Spaeny.

item.title: 'Kung Fu Panda 4' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: Po is set to become the new spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace, but before he can do that, he must find a successor to become the new Dragon Warrior.

item.title: 'Which Brings Me to You' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: Two romantic burnouts, Jane and Will, are immediately drawn to each other at a mutual friend’s wedding.

item.title: 'Dune: Part Two' Trailer 3
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: You are not prepared for what is to come. Dune: Part Two - Only in theaters March 1.

item.title: 'Founders Day' Teaser Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: A small town is shaken by a series of ominous killings in the days leading up to a heated mayoral election.

item.title: 'The Monk and the Gun' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: The Monk And The Gun captures the wonder and disruption as Bhutan becomes one of the world’s youngest democracies.

item.title: 'Soft Liquid Center' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: Steph, a newly single woman on the cusp of a better life, finds herself in a dangerous and peculiar situation not of her making.

item.title: 'All of Us Strangers' Trailer
item.dc:creator: Moviefone
item.description: One night in his near-empty tower block in contemporary London, Adam (a screenwriter, played by Andrew Scott) has a chance encounter with his mysterious neighbor Harry (Paul Mescal) that punctures the rhythm of his everyday life.
